ai-iti95:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti95:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three ways of being provided with sensual pleasures.
ai-iti95:2.3_0: Some sensual pleasures are simply present; some are for those who love to create; and some are for those who control the creations of others.
ai-iti95:2.4_0: These are the three kinds of sensual rebirth.”
ai-iti95:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti95:3.2_0: and the Gods Who Control the Creations of Others—
ai-iti95:3.4_0: and those who enjoy sensual pleasures.
ai-iti95:3.5_0: They go from this state to another,
ai-iti95:4.2_0: in sensual indulgence, an astute person
ai-iti95:5.1_0: Having cut the stream so hard to pass,
ai-iti95:6.1_0: Seers of the noble truths, knowledge-masters,
ai-iti95:6.3_0: they have understood the end of rebirth,
ai-iti95:6.4_0: they come not back to future lives.”
ai-iti95:7.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti95:7.2_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
